approach.title: Proven Capabilities
approach.intro: We are committed to building leading insurance companies. We provide a unique combination of distribution, financing, and asset management solutions to unlock new growth at established platforms. approach.title: Patient Capital
approach.intro: We are backed by world-class investors with a history of building great businesses. We are in this for the long-haul and we invest our capital accordingly. We provide strategic support and substantial resources to help our companies pursue sustainable growth opportunities.

offerings.title: Annuities
offerings.intro: We build innovative annuities platforms that offer flexible, attractive solutions to policyholders while serving as trusted stewards of their retirement savings.

offerings.title: Life Insurance & Supplemental Products
offerings.intro: We support distinctive life insurance and supplemental product platforms that focus on serving the needs of the middle-market consumer.

offerings.title: Reinsurance
offerings.intro: We partner with insurers to provide differentiated reinsurance services and solutions to companies.
